scripts.release: npm install && browserify ./src/index.js -o ./release/uptextv-bundle.js && javascript-obfuscator ./release/uptextv-bundle.js --output ./release/uptextv.js --identifier-names-generator mangled --simplify false --compact true --string-array false && mkdir ../to-zip/ && mkdir ../to-zip/mozilla_extension/ && cp ../client -r ../to-zip && rm -r ../to-zip/client/node_modules && cp release/README.md ../to-zip/README.md && cp release/manifest.json ../to-zip/mozilla_extension/manifest.json && cp release/run.js ../to-zip/mozilla_extension/run.js && cp release/uptextv.js ../to-zip/mozilla_extension/uptextv.js && cd ../to-zip/ && zip -r uptextv.zip * && mv uptextv.zip ../uptextv.zip && cd ../ && rm -r to-zip && echo done
